derivation: also (in plural) feminine מִגְדָּלָה; from H1431 (גָּדַל);
outline:
1. tower
    1. tower
    2. elevated stage, pulpit
    3. raised bed
kjv_def: castle, flower, tower. Compare the names following.
strongs_def: a tower (from its size or height); by analogy, a rostrum; figuratively, a (pyramidal) bed of flowers
